casebody.data:
Claude D. BALLEW et al., Petitioners-Appellants, v. James A. ROBINSON et al., Respondents-Appellees. No. 71-1030. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 27, 1971. Certiorari Denied Nov. 9,1971. See 92 S.Ct. 280. *585John Coleman, Mobile, Ala., Robert Eugene Smith, Towson, Md., D. Freeman Hutton, Atlanta, Ga., for petitioners-appellants. William H. Brigham, T. Raymond Williams, Mobile, Ala., for respondents-appellees.

Before GEWIN, BELL and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 P.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
